attributes.action: Make the labelling of meat slaughtered in the halal ritual compuslory.
attributes.additional_details:
At current, Halal meat is being served nationwide to unwitting customers is shops, restaurants and hotels. This petition asserts that all meat that has been killed in accordance with Sharia law must be clearly labelled, so that it is not sold to unwitting members of the public.

Halal meat is there for the minority who require it, not the majority who do not want it.
